page.title: 06WINTERTON SHOW 2
page.content: There has always been jam making and bread making. The animal shows are mainly on dogs and rabbits. They began in 1850. In 1971 they started to have floats as an annual event. This was for the celebration of a 100 years since the show began. The different groups of people pick the theme for the floats, this year it is nursery rhymes. There was a one mile race. One time it had more than 70 entries. Now there is a 10 mile race. Everyone who enters gets a medal. In 1872 there were penny farthing races. The first prize used to be a gold watch and the second a gold helmet. About 50 years ago Winterton had its own band to play at the show. The Committee once paid Â£300 for the Irish Guards to come and play at the show. In 1954 the Queen visited the show.
